E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1993
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Brady Anderson



Date: Tuesday, 2/14/1993
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Oakland has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Brady Anderson



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Warren Newson
Dear Sir,
Warren Newson shouldn't play at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an AVG of .202 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Scott Aldred
Dear Sir,
Scott Aldred has problems at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 5.88, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
